comment: The amount of sincerity you have is more than that of all other in your group combined.❤️ I have known you as one of the most displined and well mannered guys, and it was great to have shared times with you. Wishing you all the best for the times to come !!
name: Prasad Chaudhari

comment:
Shubham (SuBum) the official meme material and assignment supplier of our group..
Thanks bhai BTP me full carry krne ke liye aur har interview me bachane ke liye..
Hopefully aage jaake bhi moj masti nahi rukni chahiye.
name: Arjun Singh

comment: Aur bhai shubham abhi wifi ka network to sahi aa rha hoga vese 🌚 ping bhi sahi ekdum. Humara co-head pr name ka hi reh gya jk, bohot mje kiye club me rehkar, Inter IIT, photowalk sb. Teri bohot li pr tune bura nhi mana 😂. But club meet me ana band kr diya tu for obv reasons 🙂. ATB for oracle.
name: LOKESH KORSANE

comment: Bhai special to hai yaar tu itna lag koi nahi marta, one of the best co-head and friend, jiski chote se jhule me faat jati hai 😂, bhai bohot mast plan kari thi yaar pondi trip. All the best yaar and bhul mat jana.
name: Prahlad Pawar

comment:
Can't believe hum mystichues me the lol. Meme material shakal and expressions (mostly no expression)🙇😂
Aur bhai ab kis kisse party nikalwana bach rha?😂
See you in blr brother!
name: Nikhil Raizada

comment: Simple guy, met during our internship, Udipi jana was constant, firse milenge bangalore me. All the best
name: Rounak Jain

comment: One of the calmest and the smartest persons I know. Online Valo ki dosti se shuru hua safar, abhi college end hai, par ye safar thodi. Misal pao lover. Bhai wo alphonso mangoes aur grapes aur khaane hai mujhe😂. Baaki toh milte hi rahenge, tu kundi lagan kam kar de bas😂. All the best brother!!
name: Aditya Handa

comment: Aaj kya lagega gym mai💪?  Will miss those gym sessions with you. "Ye reel dekh!" Will always remember those reels sessions. Assignments supply krne ke liye aur exams se phle last moment pe doubts solve krne ke liye thanks. All the best bhai🤝
name: Prashant Kumar

comment: Online me valo buddies, customs jisme Jsk knife karne shift walk karta tha😂😂. Chillest guy, kabhi koi tension nahi dikhegi iske chehre pe. Nandi hills trip yaad hai na😂. Mast banda, aise hi komedi karte rehna, abhi to Bangalore me hi hai... Milte rahenge😁
name: Govind Kizhakke Mepad

comment: Most calm and composed guy. "Aye vedya" meme is the constant thing that comes into my mind seeing you XD. All the best for future brother!
name: Harsh Verma
